segments.text: Ahh ... What a fine day ! I do feel like an outdoor exercise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about taking a walk in the park ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . It's delightful to have a walk in the park with the air so fresh .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's so quiet here . We have the park to ourselves , only you and me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you see many people over there ? Just on your left .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see them . Some are doing Taijiquan , some are performing swordplay , some are practising the Chinese Wushu .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A growing keep-fit fever is sweeping over China .
segments.speaker: S1
